web_snippets: Whitney Otto is the author of five novels and one book of nonfiction. How To Make an American Quilt was a New York Times Best Seller.
Whitney Otto Coaching · About Coaching ... I'm a mom of two kids and I'm married to a professor and I live outside Boston in Cambridge, Massachusetts.
Whitney Otto was born in 1955 in the USA. Whitney is a writer, known for How to Make an American Quilt (1995).
